void View::onModelOperationProgress ( Model *  model,
int  progress 
) [virtual]

This method is used to notify progress in an operation performed on the model.

The operation can be loading or updating of the model and is usually identified by the model state.

Reimplemented from omega::mvc::IModelListener.
